bibl.title: The Tax Collector Hermogenes in New Tax Receipts from Elephantine
bibl.seg: Shereen A. Aly, The Tax Collector Hermogenes in New Tax Receipts from Elephantine.

1. O. Cair. Inv. 18955/2. Receipt for λαογραφία, AD 98/99. - 2. Inv. 18955/26. Receipt for λαογραφία, AD 98/99. - 3. Inv. 18955/5. Receipt for χειρωνάξιον, AD 98/99. - 4. Inv. 18955/6. Receipt for λαογραφία, AD 99/100. - 5. Inv. 18955/3. Receipt for λαογραφία and ἀνδριάς, 25 Jul. - 23 Aug. AD 104. - 6. Inv. 18955/4. Receipt for λαογραφία, AD 97-109.
